19cc4e42-39bb-41f9-b9de-9f2940eed6a2.overall_goal: Person performs cleaning with a mop and manages cleaning suppliesâ€”sweeping the floor, placing a cloth in the car, and then moving to retrieve cleaning items (cloth and mop-stick) from storage locations.

episodes.name: Sweep and Store
episodes.description: The person picks up and uses a mop to sweep the floor, interacts with a door, places the mop back, and puts a cloth inside the car.

episodes.name: Retrieve Supplies
episodes.description: The person moves to a cabinet, opens it, picks up a cloth, moves to a wall location while holding the cloth, and picks a mop-stick from the wall.

fbf4150a-27d2-48a4-956f-b4f85ecde465.overall_goal: Prepare and use a laptop workstation: power and pack/unpack the laptop, connect power, arrange keyboard and mouse, and operate the keyboard and mouse.

episodes.name: Initial key presses
episodes.description: The person presses keys repeatedly and presses a button (on the laptop).

954c2f61-64ad-4c89-a26f-ec4547a65fab.overall_goal: Prepare and begin cooking an onion by washing, transferring to a pot, adding water, and preparing the onion (slicing/peeling) for cooking.

episodes.name: Prepare and Cook Onion
episodes.description: The person washes the onion, moves it and a pot into position, fills the pot with water, then prepares the onion (holds, slices, peels) and places the pot on the cooker to start cooking.

277b18de-4ad9-4c09-970b-91fcea05097d.overall_goal: Prepare and stow tools, then remove a wheel and service its bolts and nuts using hand tools.

episodes.name: Gather Tools
episodes.description: The person picks up and places several hand tools (wrench, plier, spanner) preparing them on the workspace.

e9be1118-a5cf-4431-b2e8-e3edcfa9f949.overall_goal: Assemble and fasten wooden parts by positioning pieces, clamping, drilling holes, and securing with screws.

episodes.name: Positioning, clamping, drilling
episodes.description: The person picks up tools and parts, positions and fastens screws, uses clamps to secure wood pieces, aligns components, and drills holes.

episodes.name: Final screw positioning
episodes.description: The person picks up a screwdriver and a screw and positions the screw on the wood-piece in preparation for fastening.

f5c27b88-a3eb-4290-9102-0307c2809241.overall_goal: Organize and clean books on a bookshelf while inspecting and handling individual books

episodes.name: Arrange and place books
episodes.description: The person arranges a book and places it on different surfaces and the bookshelf, aligning it before removing/adjusting it.

97ad4e58-c64f-47e3-8d84-6aad38bdfbc8.overall_goal: Attach and tighten bolts on the machine using hand tools

episodes.name: Install first bolt
episodes.description: The person picks up a hammer, steadies the machine, places the hammer aside, picks up a bolt, positions it on the machine, then picks up a screwdriver and tightens the bolt while another hand holds it, finally releasing the bolt.

episodes.name: Fasten another bolt
episodes.description: The person places the screwdriver on the table, picks up another bolt, positions it on the machine, then picks up the screwdriver and tightens the bolt while the other hand holds it, finishing by releasing the bolt.

a20c2c22-cc2c-487e-8041-f0b33f4845ca.overall_goal: Prepare and attach fabric to furniture by cutting, gluing, and nailing, then trim the final fabric edges.

episodes.name: Cut Fabric
episodes.description: The person picks up scissors, holds the fabric and cuts it to shape, then puts the scissors down and releases the fabric.

860980fb-f992-4bb1-8a46-b644f58090e2.overall_goal: Assemble and glue a cardboard piece onto a prepared paper surface (using a metal board for alignment), finishing by applying glue with a brush.

episodes.name: Place metal-board
episodes.description: The person picks up a metal board and places and adjusts it onto the paper to prepare the working surface.

15d4a2c1-1cb8-4b76-a66a-adb20b7e96cb.overall_goal: Examine and manipulate a card on a table by touching/tapping, picking it up to check it, and putting it back down.

episodes.name: Initial Touch/Tap
episodes.description: The person repeatedly touches and taps the card while it remains on the table using their hand.

5533ab65-7463-47a6-b040-c0c6d65b8cf5.overall_goal: Assemble and secure components (arm, pipe, and wheel) on a motorcycle by positioning parts and tightening fasteners.

episodes.name: Fold tag
episodes.description: The person folds a tag using both hands.

5293587a-e6c4-4760-8277-cf284588aac3.overall_goal: Clean kitchenware (cups, spoons, saucers, mugs) by rinsing and scrubbing, dry them on a rack, and store them on shelves/drawer.

episodes.name: Wash and Rinse
episodes.description: The person opens/closes the tap, picks up dishes and utensils from the sink, rinses and scrubs them with a sponge, and places them on the drying rack.

episodes.name: Apply Detergent and Store
episodes.description: The person picks up a sponge and liquid (detergent), applies liquid to the sponge, scrubs and rinses remaining items, then places cleaned items on the drying rack or stores them on shelves/drawer.

ab5f1a57-29b3-4c07-bc82-bed0b1c3d42f.overall_goal: Wash and dry dishes (mug and bowl) and return them to the table

episodes.name: Wash bowl at sink
episodes.description: The person opens the tap, holds and washes/rinses the bowl, then closes the tap.

d4fc1fd7-c725-454e-9d2b-0fbc774e81d6.overall_goal: Prepare tools and materials, secure a bolt onto the engine (tighten and apply adhesive), then ready a ring and move toward the machine.

episodes.name: Prepare brush & wrench
episodes.description: The person picks up a brush and a container, dips the brush into the container, puts the container down, and then picks up a wrench.

episodes.name: Install and finish bolt
episodes.description: The person places and holds a bolt on the engine, tightens it with a wrench, handles and cleans around the bolt (using tissue and brush and applying glue), puts tools down, picks up a ring, and moves toward the machine.

efa59c4e-71de-4184-9c82-f78efd4d4702.overall_goal: Assemble and adjust a bicycle by attaching pedals and brakes, connecting cables, positioning the frame and mounting wheels, and tightening wheel bolts.

episodes.name: Attach Pedal
episodes.description: The person picks up a pedal, attaches it to the bicycle frame, and tightens the bolt using a wrench before putting the tool down.

a5a0a366-8721-413f-8412-66cf69b23b18.overall_goal: Clean used dishes and utensils and put them away into the cupboards and drawers.

episodes.name: Clean and Store Kitchenware
episodes.description: The person retrieves plates, bowls and utensils, cleans them with a cloth, and returns them to the cupboard and drawer, using hands and a cloth as instruments.

2ae97f2a-b16d-467b-b73a-721cb00996f1.overall_goal: Prepare dough, shape it into pieces, place them into a pan, and finish by applying oil with a brush.

episodes.name: Prepare and assemble
episodes.description: The person mixes and kneads dough, rolls and cuts it into pieces, places the pieces into a pan, and brushes/apply oil to them.

3ea57fa2-fd76-48c1-923e-e90b14373c7e.overall_goal: Prepare dough from ingredients, mix and knead it, then roll and cut portions and place them in a pan/table for baking.

episodes.name: Add Flour
episodes.description: The person picks up flour from a shelf, carries it to the mixer, pours it into the mixer, and places the container on the table.

episodes.name: Mix, Knead, Shape
episodes.description: The person adds remaining ingredients (sugar, water), operates the mixer, takes out the dough, kneads and adjusts it, prepares a pan, rolls and cuts the dough, and places tools back on the table.

203ee455-6f60-4e08-bd89-28e2ca3927da.overall_goal: Prepare a dough mixture, place portions on a tray, and bake them in the oven.

episodes.name: Prep and Bake Setup
episodes.description: The person readies the oven and tray, mixes dry and wet ingredients in a bowl, forms dough portions onto a tray, and readies items for baking.

episodes.name: Release Bowl
episodes.description: The person releases the bowl from their second hand, ending the manual handling of the bowl.

8be918b2-c819-4a84-98dc-5fe24835a4ac.overall_goal: Paint a door-frame using a paintbrush while preparing and managing the paint can and protective plastic on the floor.

episodes.name: Paint the frame
episodes.description: The person holds the door-frame and repeatedly dips the paintbrush into the paint and paints the door-frame.

episodes.name: Prepare and manage paint
episodes.description: The person releases the door, spreads protective plastic on the floor, moves and opens the paint-can, dips and handles the brush, and manages the paint-can lid and placement on the plastic.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Actions: release, pick-up, spread, place, remove, dip, put-down, press

44ae604b-2e16-497d-a018-03495d8d5654.overall_goal: Clean and dry the car, including washing the windshield and managing cleaning tools (bucket, hose, sponge, towel) and wipers.

episodes.name: Setup and Rinse
episodes.description: The person sets down the bucket, picks up the hose and rinses the car, then puts the hose down.

episodes.name: Prepare & Rinse
episodes.description: The person prepares cleaning materials, dries and rinses the car by getting water, spraying the car, and preparing the sponge.

episodes.name: Scrub & Rinse
episodes.description: The person raises the wiper, uses the sponge to wash and move over the car (including flipping and dipping the sponge), and releases the car as needed.

episodes.name: Finish wiper
episodes.description: The person lowers the wiper to its resting position.

3c80ddb5-5046-4d97-9162-5e5a87ccb2fd.overall_goal: Retrieve tools and use them to loosen, remove, and re-tighten a bolt on a car (managing the toolbox and storing tools as needed).

episodes.name: Open toolbox & grab
episodes.description: The person opens the toolbox and picks up a wrench from it.

episodes.name: Gather and load tools
episodes.description: The person handles a bolt at the car, moves and places the toolbox, opens the cabinet and collects tools (wrench, screwdriver) and places them into the toolbox.

episodes.name: Store toolbox & service bolt
episodes.description: The person closes storage, moves and stores the toolbox, then uses a wrench to loosen and remove a bolt from the car, places the bolt on the workbench, and later picks up, holds, and tightens the bolt back on the car.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: close, put-down, pick-up, move, place, loosen, remove, hold, tighten

05c937ff-816b-46b8-8ae2-864eae85e987.overall_goal: Remove and prepare the stand by inspecting and smoothing it with sandpaper, then place items back on the table.

episodes.name: Remove and align
episodes.description: The person holds and manipulates the stand (rotating and aligning) and then removes it from its mounting.

episodes.name: Inspect and smooth
episodes.description: The person inspects the stand, uses sandpaper (picked up with a hand) to smoothen the stand, then places objects (sandpaper and stand) on the table and makes final adjustments.

4f68183f-610a-44de-b102-e7f300b49dcd.overall_goal: Prepare and mix dough by combining ingredients, forming and kneading the dough, then returning it to the bowl and adding dry ingredients and water.

episodes.name: Prep and Mix
episodes.description: The person picks up a cloth, covers the bowl, and mixes ingredients in the bowl.

3c18ec5c-7e6b-400d-9260-70598e04a373.overall_goal: Repot a plant by placing the pot, positioning the plant, adding soil, and cleaning up.

episodes.name: Set up pot
episodes.description: The person picks up the pot and places it on the table to prepare for planting.

episodes.name: Planting & soil
episodes.description: The person places the plant into the pot, adjusts it, adds soil using a trowel (and hands), closes and stores the bag, cleans the area, and finishes by adding soil around the plant.

d851b431-8551-492b-8332-bd46c3bfdaba.overall_goal: Planting a plant into a planter and filling around it with soil using a trowel

episodes.name: Place & Fill Start
episodes.description: Person places and adjusts the plant, then repeatedly uses the trowel and bag to scoop soil and pour it into the planter, finishing by putting the trowel down.

episodes.name: Refill Cycles
episodes.description: Person (re)leases the bag as needed and continues dip/scoop/remove/pour cycles with the trowel to add more soil into the planter, then releases the planter.

episodes.name: Tidy & Finalize
episodes.description: Person picks up and uses the trowel for a final scoop/remove cycle, releases the bag, and places/holds objects (trowel on table, then holds planter) to finish.

dabf199a-bf55-440d-8aeb-77ead18097ae.overall_goal: Attach fabric to a door and secure fasteners (bolts/nuts) using hand tools.

episodes.name: Attach fabric
episodes.description: The person picks up and attaches the fabric to the door, holds and adjusts a bolt with a screwdriver, then puts the screwdriver down.

episodes.name: Fasten hardware
episodes.description: The person handles bolts, nuts and toolsâ€”releasing a bolt, picking up wrenches/spanners, loosening/tightening and placing tools and nuts into storage.

1560b9ee-e2da-4dda-a875-52e5bae8d88a.overall_goal: Disconnect a wire from a plug by unscrewing nuts and set components aside

episodes.name: Disconnect Wire Assembly
episodes.description: The person picks up the plug and screwdriver, loosens nuts with the screwdriver while manipulating the wire, disconnects and pulls the wire out of the plug, and then places the plug, wire, and tools aside.

5bc29170-aa13-4dd7-bb48-2790f676463c.overall_goal: Repair and re-establish a safe electrical connection by cutting, testing, reconnecting, insulating, and securing wiring and terminals.

episodes.name: Prepare and Cut Wire
episodes.description: The person picks up a wire and a knife, cuts the wire, and then puts the knife down.

c4d332b2-7fcc-4993-b9ea-26d6f794984f.overall_goal: Harvest leaves from plants using pruning shears and collect the cut leaves into a basket.

episodes.name: Place Basket
episodes.description: The person picks up and carries a basket and places it on the ground to prepare for collecting leaves.

df0fa70d-600e-477b-aaea-275f86ff7010.overall_goal: Install, adjust, and verify a gauge on a wheel and perform related maintenance on a motorcycle

episodes.name: Prepare parts and tools
episodes.description: The person retrieves and inspects parts and tools (pack, screws, screwdriver, rag, plier, hammer, carton) and performs initial fastening and checks of the gauge and related items.

episodes.name: Assemble gauge screw
episodes.description: The person holds the gauge while inserting and adjusting a screw into it, examining and then putting down the plier.

episodes.name: Release gauge
episodes.description: The person releases the gauge from the second hand, freeing it from being held.

episodes.name: Pick up wrench
episodes.description: The person picks up a wrench from the table in preparation for tightening and fitting tasks.

episodes.name: Install and adjust gauge
episodes.description: The person fixes the gauge onto the wheel using the wrench and hands, tightens and taps it, cleans and checks the wheel and motorcycle, then makes adjustments and moves the motorcycle as needed.

32e25924-9d92-4030-a328-11e2c4c7ac56.overall_goal: Prepare and bake shaped dough (make, season/glaze, and put the tray of dough into the oven).

episodes.name: Prepare & Shape Dough
episodes.description: The person picks up dough, transfers and dips it, then twists, shapes, rolls and places dough pieces onto a tray/table for baking.

episodes.name: Glaze with Brush
episodes.description: The person picks up a brush, applies egg-wash to the dough, then puts the brush down on the table.

episodes.name: Season & Bake
episodes.description: The person seasons the dough with salt, places prepared trays on a tray, carries the tray to the oven, places it inside, closes the oven door and sets the timer.

c1ef9d03-1278-4216-b1e4-b1a298a892d9.overall_goal: Prepare dough by scraping and cutting it into strips, stage trays, and transfer the cut dough strips into a tray.

episodes.name: Move to Table
episodes.description: The person moves to the table to begin the task.

episodes.name: Prepare and Cut Dough
episodes.description: The person picks up a scraper, scraps dough from the table, handles a tray (picks up, carries, places on rack), holds and cuts the dough into strips, and sets the scraper down.

episodes.name: Transfer Strips to Tray
episodes.description: The person releases the dough, picks up the dough strips with both hands, carries them to the tray, and drops them into the tray.

950f70a4-f90b-4a15-97a0-c14ad6960285.overall_goal: Wash, dry, and store dishes and kitchenware.

episodes.name: Wash sieve setup
episodes.description: The person picks up a sponge, turns on the tap, holds a sieve and washes it, then puts the sponge down.

episodes.name: Dry plate preparation
episodes.description: The person rinses the sieve, turns off the tap, picks up a towel to dry the sieve, puts down towel and sieve, then readies a sponge and turns the tap on to wash a plate.

episodes.name: Plate to sink
episodes.description: After rinsing and drying the plate, the person picks up a pizza tray and plates from the table, carries them to the sink and places them into the sink.

episodes.name: Sieve and pan sinking
episodes.description: The person picks up a sieve from the counter, carries it to the sink and places it there, then prepares a sponge, turns on the tap, holds a pan and washes it.

episodes.name: Dry and store items
episodes.description: The person rinses and dries the pan, then puts dishes and cookware (plates, pizza tray, pan, sieve) away into the cupboard, wipes the counter, and readies cleaning cloths and sponge.

episodes.name: Wash sink
episodes.description: The person washes the sink itself using the sponge.

episodes.name: Pan from stove to sink
episodes.description: The person turns off the tap, readies a towel, picks up a pan from the stove, carries it to the sink and places it there, then prepares to wash a pizza tray.

episodes.name: Final rinse and dry
episodes.description: The person rinses the pizza tray under the tap, turns the tap off, picks up a towel to dry the tray, and puts the towel down.

583ff0cb-4697-4f63-b525-bf5bc2318117.overall_goal: Prepare, shape, and bake dough into bread.

episodes.name: Mixing and Baking Prep
episodes.description: The person measures and works the dough (using flour), interacts with the oven (opens, places or retrieves bread), and starts the baking process (sets timer and presses start).

episodes.name: Rolling Dough
episodes.description: The person picks up and places a rolling pin and rolls the dough on the table, then returns the rolling pin to the table.

episodes.name: Machine Setup and Operation
episodes.description: The person carries a tray to the dough-machine, places it on a shelf next to the machine, and then operates the dough-machine.

f35817ce-c97c-4795-b92d-bfd71aa3c7de.overall_goal: Service and reassemble parts of a motorbike (remove and replace screws/covers and secure bolts)

episodes.name: Install bolt
episodes.description: The person positions the motorbike, picks up a bolt and screwdriver and tightens the bolt onto the motorbike, then puts down the screwdriver.

episodes.name: Release hold
episodes.description: The person releases the motorbike from their supporting hand.

episodes.name: Begin unscrewing
episodes.description: The person picks up a screwdriver, holds the motorbike steady and untightens a screw.

episodes.name: Remove and reassemble
episodes.description: The person releases and holds parts, removes screws, sets tools and screws down, handles a cover, places and tightens screws/bolts, moves a box and retrieves bolts, and finally tightens and releases the motorbike.

fefb0892-7e1a-4a34-9418-ea1c96705edc.overall_goal: Prepare and care for a potted plant (clean pot, groom and place the plant, fertilize and water, then trim leaves).

episodes.name: Clean Pot
episodes.description: The person picks up a cloth and wipes the pot clean, then puts the cloth down and releases the pot.

56ddd3b9-5598-4f87-8a90-3f7c810d3e74.overall_goal: Remove a wheel, service its fasteners, and reattach and adjust the wheel on a motorbike

episodes.name: Remove Fasteners
episodes.description: The person picks up tools (wrench, screwdriver, hammer), unscrews bolts and screws from the wheel, taps to loosen if needed, and places tools on the workbench.

episodes.name: Mount Wheel
episodes.description: The person lifts the wheel off the motorbike, places it in a vice, picks up a wrench and screws bolts into the wheel, then places the wrench back on the workbench.

episodes.name: Reattach & Adjust Wheel
episodes.description: The person lifts the wheel from the vice, attaches it back onto the motorbike, tightens the bolts with a wrench, places the wrench down, then inspects, adjusts, and checks wheel alignment and rotation.

c9a6233c-7a8b-488c-b0ab-bce963c643bd.overall_goal: Assemble and secure a chair by positioning components and fastening joints, screws, and bolts

episodes.name: Position & Prepare
episodes.description: The person moves the carton, picks up tools, holds the chair joint, taps the joint with a hammer, and then releases the joint.

episodes.name: Fasten Screws
episodes.description: The person picks up a screwdriver and screws, inserts screws into the chair, tightens them with the screwdriver, and places the screwdriver on the platform.

episodes.name: Adjust & Tighten Bolt
episodes.description: The person releases and repositions the chair, pulls it into place, and tightens a bolt on the chair using a spanner.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: release, hold, pull, tighten

a61ec2b9-bc21-4e55-ac3f-9f52407633cc.overall_goal: Prepare and bake a dough-based dish by shaping dough, combining ingredients, and placing it in the oven.

episodes.name: Cut Dough
episodes.description: The person picks up a scrapper, holds and cuts the dough with the scrapper, then puts the scrapper down.

episodes.name: Assemble and Bake
episodes.description: The person releases and shapes the dough (rolling/stretching), adds and spreads flour, places the dough into a pan, puts the pan into the oven and sets the timer, then adds water and mixes flour and water to combine.

a1f09ebf-619d-41fd-841d-56629d803003.overall_goal: Tidy and clean the workspace by collecting and disposing of debris, scraping a wooden surface, and sweeping up dust.

episodes.name: Collect & Scrape
episodes.description: The person gathers trash and supplies into a bucket, dons gloves, then scrapes a wooden surface using a scraper.

episodes.name: Organize & Sweep
episodes.description: The person retrieves and places larger items (rod, ladder), uses a scraper to scrub the floor, then sweeps and collects dust with a broom and dustpan.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Actions: pick-up, place, hold, scrub, put-down, sweep, collect

26b635ab-134a-477c-a22e-e805eed07a9d.overall_goal: Wash kitchenware (plates and utensils) using a soapy sponge and place them on the drying rack.

episodes.name: Prepare tools
episodes.description: Person prepares for washing by taking and wearing a glove, getting and wetting the sponge, taking and applying soap, then setting soap and sponge down.

8cf5a53b-fa9c-4fe7-b767-697133d4d5b8.overall_goal: Prepare painting materials and paint an object with a paintbrush, then clean and put away the brush and tools.

episodes.name: Prepare and Paint
episodes.description: The person readies the canvas and painting tools, mixes paint on a palette, and applies paint to the target using a paintbrush.

episodes.name: Clean and Store
episodes.description: The person cleans the paintbrush by dipping and swirling it in water, wipes it with a cloth, and puts tools back down.

4988de48-c77e-406d-8367-68fe2266a8aa.overall_goal: Carve, refine, and finish a wooden sculpture using chisels and hand tools

episodes.name: Initial Carving
episodes.description: The person picks up a chisel and carves the wood, inspects the carved area, then places the chisel on the workbench.

episodes.name: Sculpture Adjustment
episodes.description: The person adjusts machine parts and the sculpture, repeatedly picks up and places the chisel, shaves and wipes the wood, and examines progress before transferring the chisel.

episodes.name: Clamp & Finishing
episodes.description: The person adjusts and fixes a clamp on the machine, holds and places the wood on the workbench, measures and marks it, carves and smoothens surfaces, then brushes off dust.

aa8fcce0-75d1-485f-aede-5d9e6997ad41.overall_goal: Prepare and clean the car interior by removing trash, unlocking and opening the car, cleaning the seat, cleaning the mat and placing it into the car, and preparing a cleaning cloth.

episodes.name: Access & Seat Cleaning
episodes.description: The person retrieves keys, removes trash into a bag, opens and unlocks the car, and cleans the car seat with a cloth.

episodes.name: Mat Cleaning & Prep
episodes.description: The person releases the seat, takes out the mat, brushes and carries it, places it into the car, retrieves cloth and bottle from a bag, and pours liquid onto the cloth.

6cfe67ef-f0cc-47f0-8808-31efcf876095.overall_goal: Assemble the furniture by placing and fastening screws, aligning and positioning the piece, and then inspecting and stowing tools.

episodes.name: Gather & Position Screws
episodes.description: The person picks up the screwdriver and screws from the bowl and positions screws onto the furniture piece in preparation for fastening.

41b8254c-ca1e-464c-9323-55301fb5f0e8.overall_goal: Prepare and assemble a sweet iced drink (retrieve ingredients, add ice, pour liquid, and add sugar).

episodes.name: Retrieve bottle
episodes.description: The person opens the fridge, takes a bottle out, closes the fridge, and places the bottle on the counter.

episodes.name: Get & prep spoon
episodes.description: The person opens a drawer to get a spoon, places it on the counter, interacts with a cup (tastes), rinses the spoon under the tap, and uses the spoon to stir the drink.

episodes.name: Add ice
episodes.description: The person opens the freezer, takes out the ice tray, places it on the counter, removes ice cubes from the tray, and adds the ice into the cup.

episodes.name: Pour & sweeten
episodes.description: The person picks up the bottle, opens and pours liquid into the cup, puts the bottle down, opens a jar, scoops sugar with a spoon, adds sugar into the cup, and places the spoon back.

d04f8465-d11f-40d1-8315-302380ec0af4.overall_goal: Modify a pen using a cutter: adjust/remove/reattach its cover (cap) and then cut and inspect the pen.

episodes.name: Prepare and Modify Cover
episodes.description: The person picks up a cutter and the pen cover, cuts and attaches the cover to the pen, manipulates the cover (holding, pulling off) and places objects down as needed.

episodes.name: Cut and Inspect Pen
episodes.description: The person holds the pen, uses the cutter to cut the pen, puts the cutter down, and inspects the pen.

577f3941-c9f6-45d3-893e-3fd12cffcad1.overall_goal: Inspect a plant, remove a rope (untie/loosen), collect and store the rope, and clean up afterwards

episodes.name: Inspect and Prepare
episodes.description: The person inspects the plant, clears debris, brings and holds the plant while examining a rope connection.

episodes.name: Place Plant Down
episodes.description: The person places the plant down (repositioning or setting it down).

episodes.name: Untie, Remove and Collect Rope
episodes.description: The person unties, loosens, untangles and pulls the rope from the plant, removes and places the rope on the ground, collects it and stores it, then wipes hands.

352f1eea-606d-4cd7-906f-733affaf6823.overall_goal: Dismantle a fence section, collect and pack the removed parts and tools, and untie a rope knot.

episodes.name: Remove board
episodes.description: The person lifts, carries and places a fence board onto the ground.

5ec85bbd-e6c4-46e3-8da5-28576730b35f.overall_goal: Arrange tableware on the dining table and collect cups and plates onto a tray for serving

episodes.name: Arrange Tableware
episodes.description: The person arranges cups, plates, and a dish on the dining table, adjusts their positions, and inspects the overall arrangement.

e8e54409-495b-49e5-b325-556c812d6ff4.overall_goal: Wash, rinse, dry, and put away dishes and utensils (plates, bowls, forks) using soap, sponge, and towel

episodes.name: Prepare cleaning
episodes.description: Turn on the tap and prepare cleaning supplies by picking up a sponge and soap and applying soap to the sponge.

f646012d-baca-46a6-bc03-32047c83f5dc.overall_goal: Prepare and service a camera by cleaning it, attaching a cover with a screwdriver, and later holding/cleaning and removing the cover.

episodes.name: Clean & Prep Camera
episodes.description: The person picks up wipes and the camera, cleans the camera (including the inside), and returns the wipe and camera to the table.

episodes.name: Attach Cover
episodes.description: The person picks up a cover and places it onto the camera, then picks up a screwdriver to screw the cover onto the camera and puts the screwdriver back on the table.

episodes.name: Hold, Clean & Remove
episodes.description: The person holds and cleans the camera again, puts the wipe down, picks up the screwdriver and unscrews (removes) the cover, then puts the screwdriver back on the table.

831a2da3-bf97-4a79-aa47-16bcdca9e3cd.overall_goal: Load laundry into the washing machine and add detergent to start a wash

episodes.name: Bring laundry basket
episodes.description: The person picks up the laundry basket, carries it to the washing machine, and puts it down next to the machine.

1db339f1-f887-4e46-86be-2df8eda596db.overall_goal: Refill the car's windshield-washer reservoir by fetching water with a bucket and carrying and pouring it into the car.

episodes.name: Refill washer fluid
episodes.description: The person repeatedly picks up a bucket, goes to a tap to fill it with water, carries it to the car, and pours water into the car's container (inspecting/placing the bucket as needed).

303505b9-2cf3-488d-ae5f-d72d3bf73585.overall_goal: Prepare, attach, and decorate a cardboard craft onto a model train.

episodes.name: Cut & Prepare Cardboard
episodes.description: The person picks up and cuts cardboard, trims excess cloth, applies glue, and positions the cardboard for later attachment.

episodes.name: Place & Press Cloth
episodes.description: The person picks up cloth, places it onto the glued cardboard, presses it down, and aligns the cardboard on the train.

episodes.name: Apply Extra Glue
episodes.description: The person picks up glue, applies it to the cardboard, and puts the glue back down.

episodes.name: Final Press & Paint
episodes.description: The person finalizes attachment by pressing the cardboard onto the train, inspects the crafts, paints the cardboard, and puts the brush down.

92af2e29-8b4c-4a37-bb48-f3b3e4d1901a.overall_goal: Remove the car mat, thoroughly clean and dry it, then return and place it back in the car

episodes.name: Open Car Door
episodes.description: The person opens the car door to begin removing the mat.

episodes.name: Remove and Clean Mat
episodes.description: The person removes the mat from the car, carries it to the ground, performs a sequence of cleaning steps (spray, scrub, rinse, dry, shake, beat, vacuum), then picks it up and returns it to the car to place and straighten it.

e03004cc-80ce-4d82-9d09-f50fc82b6456.overall_goal: Prepare paint and apply it to a piece of wood

episodes.name: Setup work surface
episodes.description: The person picks up cardboard from the floor, places it on the workbench, then places the wood on the cardboard.

e08c9103-d6a0-4a43-8276-c8f5e7cfe57f.overall_goal: Assemble and secure the grinder wheel, then prepare and sharpen the chisel using the grinder.

episodes.name: Prepare Lock & Hold
episodes.description: The person picks up a key, inserts it into the grinder's lock, and holds the grinder in place.

episodes.name: Mount & Secure Wheel
episodes.description: The person positions the chisel, picks up and places the wheel onto the grinder, aligns and tightens it using a wrench, and manipulates a key (insert/turn/remove) related to the grinder lock.

episodes.name: Position Chisel
episodes.description: The person holds the chisel against the rotating wheel with the second hand to ready it for filing.

episodes.name: File Chisel
episodes.description: The person turns the handle as needed and files the chisel against the grinder wheel using the hands and the grinder wheel.

d84b8c76-d6b9-4e27-ae66-b010bce5ed1e.overall_goal: Prepare and iron fabric: arrange fabric on the ironing board, press it with an iron, then fold, check, and move the finished fabric to the table.

episodes.name: Prepare & Iron
episodes.description: The person adjusts and arranges the fabric on the ironing board, picks up and uses the iron to press the fabric, then places the iron back on the board.

episodes.name: Finish & Move
episodes.description: The person releases the fabric, repositions and irons as needed, checks/feels and folds the fabric, then picks it up and moves it to the table.

1fdbef9f-8aa7-46b1-8063-d1435577608a.overall_goal: Prepare and iron garments (lay out, press, then fold and store clothes)

episodes.name: Prepare & Fold
episodes.description: The person picks up garments, lays them out and adjusts them on the board, removes/places the iron, then folds garments and places folded items on the board/storage.

episodes.name: Ironing Garment
episodes.description: The person retrieves the iron, places the garment on the board, and repeatedly presses and moves the iron across the garment with lifts and placements, finishing by setting the iron down.

e252c493-e587-403d-bd01-22713a1d5a57.overall_goal: Prepare and iron a shirt, store the iron, then fold the shirt.

episodes.name: Grab Iron
episodes.description: The person picks up the iron from the board to prepare for ironing.

episodes.name: Ironing & Storing
episodes.description: The person holds and irons the shirt, adjusts it on the board, turns the iron off, temporarily stores the iron in a cabinet, then retrieves it to continue ironing and places it back on the board.

episodes.name: Position & Fold Shirt
episodes.description: The person picks up the shirt from the table, carries and places it on the board, adjusts it, picks it up from the board again, and folds it.

ea87324e-d129-425f-b247-e6bcc4ff332c.overall_goal: Refinish a wooden piece by applying paint, then sanding and cleaning the surface, and preparing/opening materials.

episodes.name: Apply Paint Coats
episodes.description: The person picks up a paintbrush, dips it into a can, holds the wood and repeatedly paints it, then puts down the brush and releases the wood.

episodes.name: Sand and Wipe
episodes.description: The person picks up sandpaper, holds the wood and sands it, puts down and picks up materials (sandpaper and cloth), wipes the wood, then releases it.

episodes.name: Prepare Materials
episodes.description: The person picks up a screwdriver and a can and uses the screwdriver (with hand1) to open the can.

7da432dc-690a-49da-8f44-312c84494c75.overall_goal: Paint a rail and then clean and put away the paintbrush and paint-can

episodes.name: Apply Paint to Rail
episodes.description: The person repeatedly dips and uses a paintbrush to apply paint along a rail, moving the brush along the rail and handling the paint-can (open/place/pick-up) as needed.

episodes.name: Refresh Brush in Paint
episodes.description: The person dips the paintbrush into paint and then lifts it out, refreshing the brush for continued painting.

episodes.name: Put Away & Clean Brush
episodes.description: The person places paint-cans and brush on the ground, closes and moves the can, then dips and cleans the paintbrush in a water bucket, takes it out and shakes off water.

episodes.name: Dry and Store Brush
episodes.description: The person holds a cloth, wipes the remaining water off the paintbrush with the cloth, and then places the brush on the workbench.

e8cf9894-0cc7-4480-b490-885308bfb513.overall_goal: Prepare, bake, and finish dough pieces (shape, cut, bake, and egg-wash the pastries)

episodes.name: Dough preparation
episodes.description: The person picks up and shapes dough/dough-pieces, places them on a tray, cleans the workspace, opens the oven and readies tools, then cuts dough into pieces and releases the dough from the hand.

episodes.name: Load and start bake
episodes.description: The person opens the oven, picks up the tray and places it into the oven, closes it and sets the timer; they also pick up and dip a brush into egg preparing for finishing.

episodes.name: Egg wash finish
episodes.description: The person holds the tray, applies egg (with the brush) to the dough-pieces, and then puts down the brush.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: hold, apply, put-down

e43f5b38-213a-4d42-afaa-32c3b77f4da6.overall_goal: Prepare and assemble a dough-based dish: shape and season the dough, bake it, and spread sauce on top.

episodes.name: Dough Prep
episodes.description: The person picks up and places dough and tools, adds flour, rolls and shapes the dough using tools and hands.

episodes.name: Bake & Topping Prep
episodes.description: The person readies the oven and tray, places the tray into the oven, then picks up containers, sprinkles/pours seasonings, retrieves a pot and scoops sauce.

episodes.name: Sauce Spreading
episodes.description: The person spreads sauce onto the dough using a spoon, evenly covering the surface.

c7cc9fbf-e47a-4bc7-9f08-7ff6954a787a.overall_goal: Prepare dough from flour and water: mix and knead ingredients, then process the dough in a machine.

episodes.name: Prepare & Mix
episodes.description: The person retrieves and opens the flour bag, holds the bowl, mixes flour and water in the bowl, then kneads the resulting dough.

3121a918-44a3-446a-b809-95e1b5766cb0.overall_goal: Clean, rinse, dry and store kitchenware (tray, grater, plates, cups, bowls) using a sponge/cloth and tap.

episodes.name: Store tray
episodes.description: The person picks up a tray, carries it into a cupboard, places it inside and closes the cupboard.

312da1d0-9e56-4f5e-bb12-9cb67e8bc674.overall_goal: Prepare and operate a generator, connect a hose, and irrigate plants.

episodes.name: Generator and Hose Setup
episodes.description: The person prepares and configures the generator and hose: interacting with machine controls, handling lids and tank, and connecting/adjusting the hose.

episodes.name: Irrigation and Cleanup
episodes.description: The person connects wires, prepares liquids (shakes and pours fuel), inspects and wipes, connects or repositions the hose, then sprays water onto plants and finishes by turning water off.

1f757b4c-032e-4012-a0f9-bb7c1a437612.overall_goal: Attach and secure a wire around a hose and verify its tightness using hands and pliers.

episodes.name: Prepare and Fasten
episodes.description: The person gathers the hose and wire, wraps and ties the wire around the hose, manipulates it with pliers, and places tools on the workbench.

episodes.name: Final Secure Check
episodes.description: The person picks up the hose and wire again, places the wire on the workbench, checks and adjusts the wire's tightness, and secures it.

4fcddb9e-38ad-4948-acf6-dd76e87f7eb3.overall_goal: Install and secure a bicycle wheel using tools, inspect and clean components, and ensure proper fitment

episodes.name: Screwdriver Use
episodes.description: Person picks up a screwdriver, tightens screws on a wheel, then returns the screwdriver to the toolbox.

39865b55-0b68-4cf9-a9fa-d55cfbc5909b.overall_goal: Inspect, assemble, and fasten parts on an engine (inspect components, attach covers/nuts, and tighten fasteners).

episodes.name: Inspect & Attach Cover
episodes.description: The person inspects the engine, removes/places a cover, attaches it with screws and nuts, and tightens bolts while using various tools.

episodes.name: Fasten & Finalize
episodes.description: The person removes an obstruction from a nut, picks up tools and tightens remaining screws/metal pieces on the engine, then puts tools down.

4ad40842-5cee-49c2-a382-211fd7a4872b.overall_goal: Remove baked bread from the oven, transfer it to a basket, clean and return the tray and tools, close the oven, and arrange the bread and utensils on the table.

episodes.name: Retrieve & Transfer
episodes.description: The person takes a tray out of the oven, opens the oven, scoops bread with a paddle and transfers the bread into a basket, then places the paddle on the table.

episodes.name: Clean, Return & Arrange
episodes.description: The person brushes crumbs off the table, places the brush down, picks up the tray and spatula, returns the tray to the oven and closes it, then arranges the bread in the basket and puts the spatula on the table.

72d27890-983d-48f8-8eed-7ca937424ca2.overall_goal: Secure a plant with a rope, loosen and extract it, then untie and store the rope and remove a nearby weed.

episodes.name: Tie and Prepare
episodes.description: The person picks up a rope, ties it around the plant, tightens and holds it, and loosens the soil around the plant to prepare for extraction.

episodes.name: Extract, Untie, Store
episodes.description: The person releases the rope, pulls the plant out of the ground and places it, unties and coils the rope and places it in a toolbox, then finishes by gripping and uprooting a weed.

a814274f-898a-4bc4-ad93-f764844bf03c.overall_goal: Prepare, assemble, and place a wooden part by cutting, measuring, marking, inserting a screw, and final positioning/removing tape.

episodes.name: Cutting and Assembly
episodes.description: The person prepares and assembles the wooden piece: they pick up tools (saw, drill, ruler, pencil, screwdriver), cut and drill the wood, measure and mark it, insert a screw and tighten it, placing some tools back down as they go.

episodes.name: Positioning and Cleanup
episodes.description: The person repositions the wooden piece on the workbench, secures and holds it, removes tape from the wood, and puts the tape down.

82dc7a9e-a0a4-4611-8e49-960d6c77b326.overall_goal: Refinish and maintain a railing by painting it, repairing/assembling fasteners, and cleaning and inspecting the surface.

episodes.name: Paint and Repair
episodes.description: The person paints the railing, handles and moves a chair, then uses a screwdriver to hold and tighten a bolt, and finally cleans/brushes the railing.

episodes.name: Clean and Inspect
episodes.description: The person picks up a cloth, wipes the railing with it, then inspects the railing.

7070897e-556f-421a-b662-551fe2ab7fb5.overall_goal: Secure a container by placing its lid and sealing the seam with tape

episodes.name: Prepare and Place Lid
episodes.description: The person picks up the lid and container, cleans the container surface with a cloth, aligns and places the lid onto the container, presses to seat it, then picks up tape and cuts a piece.

episodes.name: Tape and Finish
episodes.description: The person places the tape and scissors on the table, applies the tape around the lid edge, smooths it down, and checks the attached tape.

3619f6fe-9722-4e98-ac1a-372821f1ec78.overall_goal: Person gathers and stows various personal items into the vehicle (trunk, interior compartments, glove box) and closes storage.

episodes.name: Pack and Stow Items
episodes.description: The person opens vehicle compartments, picks up multiple personal items and places them into the trunk, interior locations, and glove box, then closes the compartments.

3db79f36-a611-42f6-bfb7-76cf7720a00a.overall_goal: Sew fabric using a needle and thread, then finish the work by trimming excess thread and smoothing the sewn fabric.

episodes.name: Threading & Stitching
episodes.description: The person picks up needle and thread and performs sewing actions (stitching, pulling, tightening), then places tools and thread on the workbench.

episodes.name: Trimming & Finishing
episodes.description: The person picks up scissors and other items to cut thread, pass and adjust thread/needle, examine and adjust the sewn fabric, trim excess thread, and smooth the finished fabric, placing tools on the workbench as needed.

39653b45-9792-4ef2-bc6b-945431870ce3.overall_goal: Knit a piece of fabric from yarn using knitting needles, finishing and inspecting the completed work

episodes.name: Set up stitches
episodes.description: The person prepares the yarn and needle and creates initial loops on the knitting needle (cast-on and first stitch formation).

episodes.name: Knit and finish
episodes.description: The person continues knitting the fabric, manages tension, cuts and inspects the finished fabric, and adjusts as needed.

0da6e15a-d33b-4a61-bfce-1fb28d893637.overall_goal: Create and tighten crochet stitches using a crochet hook and yarn.

episodes.name: Prepare yarn and hook
episodes.description: The person picks up yarn and the crochet hook, checks and adjusts yarn tension, forms a loop around the hook, pulls yarn through the loop, places and tightens the loop, then releases the yarn from the hand to prepare for stitching.

episodes.name: Form and secure stitches
episodes.description: The person performs repeated crochet motions (wrapping and pulling yarn with the hook and hands), places and picks up the hook as needed, tightens and loosens stitches, and puts the hook down to continue and finish stitch formation.

f8442573-f48f-4f2b-9f22-b208f916aa63.overall_goal: Clean and tidy the hose and surrounding area: remove debris, clean the hose, and roll/store the hose on a hanger.

episodes.name: Hold and Clean
episodes.description: The person secures the hose and uses a rag to clean it, then handles and puts the rag away.

episodes.name: Tidy and Store Hose
episodes.description: The person picks up debris and disposes it, then picks up the hose, untangles, stretches, arranges and rolls it, and carries and places the hose onto a hanger, making final adjustments.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Actions: pick-up, put, untangle, stretch, release, hold, arrange, roll, carry, place, adjust

49374bc5-0999-49dc-88bd-c42c0d54365f.overall_goal: Clean and dry a car by wiping, rinsing, spraying away soap, and final drying.

episodes.name: Rag Wipe Cycle
episodes.description: The person prepares and uses a rag (dipping, rinsing, wringing) to wipe the car repeatedly, then puts the rag down.

9f9f42f0-b9fc-4247-8dad-3ef0ff36e402.overall_goal: Prepare and finish a wooden surface by brushing, removing debris, applying oil, sanding, and wiping.

episodes.name: Pick up brush
episodes.description: The person picks up the brush with their hand to begin working on the wood.

episodes.name: Brush and remove debris
episodes.description: The person holds the wood and uses the brush to clean the wood and remove leaf debris, then puts the brush down.

episodes.name: Release leaf
episodes.description: The person releases the leaf (previously held) using their other hand.

episodes.name: Oil, sand, and wipe
episodes.description: The person treats the wood by picking up oil and applying it, sanding the wood with sandpaper, and finally wiping the surface with a cloth.

6f082d5d-5f31-4358-b2dc-16d320312ab3.overall_goal: Prepare and cook dough strips (rolling, cooking and seasoning), then cut/separate the pieces and tidy up.

episodes.name: Roll and Cook Dough
episodes.description: The person rolls dough with a rolling-pin, cooks dough strips in a pan on the stove (flipping and removing to a plate), then kneads and seasons the dough, cleans the table and puts away tools.

episodes.name: Cut and Separate
episodes.description: The person cuts dough with a cutter, places the cutter, picks up a scraper and uses it to separate dough-strips, then places the scraper on the table.

6287465a-ef00-49db-b730-1e1c22e77790.overall_goal: Clean the floor by sweeping up dust, collecting it into a dustpan, and disposing of debris in a bin.

episodes.name: Store / put tools
episodes.description: The person picks up and places the broom and dustpan into a storage area (preparing or stowing tools).

1695475c-e527-43e6-b70e-69fd33023148.overall_goal: Prepare and connect a cable to a socket by readying wires, securing fasteners, insulating connections, and inserting the cable into the socket.

episodes.name: Assemble and Prepare Wires
episodes.description: The person picks up and uses tools to prepare wires and fasten components, including cutting wires, tightening screws/bolts, wrapping insulation tape, and placing tools back.

episodes.name: Cable Insertion
episodes.description: The person picks up the cable and socket (using hands) and inserts the cable into the socket to complete the connection.

d6de6eee-b844-49c9-81d4-325fb9697ef6.overall_goal: Prepare assembled nut-topped crackers and place them on a plate

episodes.name: Arrange crackers
episodes.description: The person arranges crackers onto a plate as a starting setup.

e435eea1-e4f7-4eef-970e-227152032a08.overall_goal: Clean and rinse a keg, then transport it and manipulate its lid (place, secure, and later remove).

episodes.name: Rinse and Clean
episodes.description: The person picks up a cup, fills and pours water into the keg, operates the faucet, and rinses the inside and outside of the keg using a hose.

episodes.name: Move and Lid Handling
episodes.description: The person puts down the hose, moves the keg (carrying and placing it on/out of a shelf and ground), then picks up and places the lid on the keg, tightens it and later unscrews/removes it.

aa2975d0-9339-4ebf-8f3a-bbdf91bf82ed.overall_goal: Prepare, mix, inspect, and seal a soil mixture in a container for storage/processing.

episodes.name: Prepare tools
episodes.description: The person picks up a trowel and holds the container to get ready for collecting soil.

episodes.name: Collect and mix
episodes.description: The person collects soil with the trowel from a bucket, pours it into the container, stirs the soil in the container, and sets tools/parts down.

episodes.name: Inspect and seal
episodes.description: The person inspects the soil mixture in the container, puts the container down, picks up the lid, places and closes it, then picks up and shakes the sealed container.

fdb68b7b-f09f-4a71-a85c-b02e728e9566.overall_goal: Repair and service a bicycle wheel and tire (installing, fitting, tightening, then disassembling/removing tire/wheel as needed).

episodes.name: Prepare & Attach Wheel
episodes.description: The person brings the bicycle to the workbench, holds and attaches the wheel, inserts and secures a bolt, and applies glue to the tire.

episodes.name: Fit Tire & Tighten
episodes.description: The person prepares and attaches a patch to the tire, fits the tire onto the wheel using a screwdriver, and tightens the bolt with a wrench.

episodes.name: Loosen & Remove Wheel
episodes.description: The person uses tools (wrench, screwdriver) from the toolbox to loosen bolts, remove bolts and the wheel, and place the wheel on the workbench.

episodes.name: Final Tire Removal
episodes.description: The person releases and holds the wheel/tire and removes the tire from the wheel (final disassembly step).

19ed57bf-e23d-425b-a396-30daa1d5e750.overall_goal: Perform maintenance on a motorcycle/scooter: remove and refit a tyre, tighten and loosen fasteners, inspect and clean components, and handle screws/bolts.

episodes.name: Tyre removal & fit
episodes.description: The person picks up the tyre, removes it from the motorcycle, places it on the floor, then picks it up again and fits it onto the motorcycle.

episodes.name: Inspect scooter
episodes.description: The person checks the scooter, looking for a screw.

episodes.name: Tighten fasteners
episodes.description: The person picks up tools (spanner and wrench), tightens screws and bolts on the scooter and motorcycle, and puts the tools down on the workbench.

episodes.name: Inspect, clean & disassemble
episodes.description: The person inspects the motorcycle, cleans off grease with a cloth, then uses tools (wrench, spanner, screwdriver) to unscrew and remove screws and bolts, placing removed items and tools on the workbench.

d4346ac0-ef62-405b-9086-4ee0085af9ab.overall_goal: Install and secure a ceiling-mounted holder using a screwdriver and a ladder, then stow the tools.

episodes.name: Prepare and install
episodes.description: The person takes out a screwdriver and holder, holds the holder against the ceiling, fixes it with the screwdriver, and releases the holder.

episodes.name: Reposition, repeat, and stow
episodes.description: The person stows the screwdriver, moves and repositions a ladder, picks up another holder, climbs the ladder, retrieves and uses the screwdriver and holder again to fix the ceiling, releases it, and finally puts the screwdriver away.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Actions: put

c9f5958f-ea3f-452e-913d-4f6ede7decea.overall_goal: Trim and clear vines and plants: cut and remove unwanted growth, collect and dispose of debris, and secure plants with rope.

episodes.name: Prepare Tools
episodes.description: The person picks up pruning tools and a rope from their pack/waist and briefly puts the pruner back into the pack.

episodes.name: Prune and Clear
episodes.description: The person holds and cuts vines and plants, pulls out growth, carries and puts cut material into a bin, manages the rope, and ties/holds plants as needed.

f643d88a-92cc-456d-bed7-c010275637e8.overall_goal: Tend the garden by removing weeds and vine growth, collecting debris, and watering the plants.

episodes.name: Garden maintenance
episodes.description: The person removes weeds and vines, cuts and stores tools, gathers grass with a rake, and waters and tends plants.

99158929-5e0b-4fa5-948c-9791c25cf0ac.overall_goal: Extract and organize papers from a booklet and arrange them on the table.

episodes.name: Paper extraction and arrangement
episodes.description: The person repeatedly picks up, adjusts, and places papers on the table, pulls pages out of a booklet and places them, then sets the booklet down and opens it.

f0beca54-3ef3-4c5f-a3e3-c10478e624b5.overall_goal: Remove, service, and reattach a bicycle pedal (including replacing/tightening its nut) using hand tools.

episodes.name: Test and Move
episodes.description: The person tests and moves the pedal, then moves toward the bicycle to begin work.

episodes.name: Remove and Reattach Pedal
episodes.description: The person uses spanner and pliers to remove the pedal and its nut, place tools down, position the pedal on the bicycle, attach and tighten the nut, inspect, and put tools away.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Actions: pick-up, hold, loosen, remove, put-down, move, position, tighten, place, inspect, attach

1cddd647-6aaf-49ed-b09d-922d729453a8.overall_goal: Organize books by picking them up, inspecting them, and placing them onto the bookshelf or table.

episodes.name: Heap to Bookshelf
episodes.description: The person picks a book from a heap, examines it, and places it onto a bookshelf.

d19faa97-b823-4c1d-b00b-e9839f1a2391.overall_goal: Prepare and tune the guitar and set up the music/book for playing

episodes.name: Prepare/Read Book
episodes.description: The person picks up and opens a book, flips and marks pages, and reads from the book while holding it.

episodes.name: Tune Guitar & Setup
episodes.description: The person picks up the guitar, releases/adjusts and tightens strings to test and hold the instrument, then places and adjusts the book on a stand for reading.
